review: Nice product, quick fit to the tv, easy access, able to pull up variety of videos and games. I like the portability. One draw back, although it can be 2nd screen for my kindle fire for video choices- I have Not been able to Mirror the kindle. The online help directs me a screen on my kindle but my kindle does Not contain the option to Mirror. This is a major drawback for my original purpose- I wanted to be able to share specific website actions on the big screen with my family, Maybe I don't have the newest version, but I recently added the 6" hd fire to my collection, I thought that was the most current version. sigh.....Update:  I spoke with Amazon support, only the HDX fire tablets can mirror.
